place_description: Sorella Coffee is located in Historic Downtown Monroe. Serving Craft Coffee, Pastries, and Housemade Syrups.

reviews_data.review_text: Absolutely love this coffee shop! The atmosphere is so cozy and charming, with plenty of comfortable seating indoors and out. The drinks are consistently great, and they always have very interesting and creative seasonal drinks. The staff is very friendly and they really care about making good coffee. You will not leave this place disappointed!

Originally had made a review about mid coffee. But then I explored more of the menu. It was pricey, but I enjoyed it. The atmosphere and service is exceptional. I love the central location in the heart of Monroe.

Whew this place was packed and the vibes are cute. The actual coffees / chai we got was beyond disappointing. Literally everything tasted like milk. I petition for cute aesthetic coffee shops to have actual good coffee!!!!

We were driving through Monroe and decided to stop and try out this coffee shop.   I'm glad we stopped.   Very easy to get to.   Parking could be tricky but we got lucky to get a parking spot across from them.  The shop is very bright, clean and airy.  The energy is very relaxing and peaceful!  Tyler and Tucker were very friendly,  welcoming and helpful!  They helped us out and answered our questions!  We ordered 2 mocha lattes and a matcha latte.   They were very delicious!  Looking forward to coming back again and try some other coffees!!!  I loved their take-out bag!
30 min wait line to get a coffee ..
This is a really good coffee shop to study in I really love the  matcha with lavender syrup and the bagels is such a chefs kiss
Nice environment
Awesome coffee spot. Great atmosphere and an even better cappuccino.
I got the Cherry Vanilla latte (with oatmilk). It was creamy and can tasted a hint of a cherry flavor.  I liked it :)

I absolutely love this coffee shop. The atmosphere is calm, staff and patrons are friendly and welcoming, the coffee is outstanding and consistent. The lavender syrup is one of the best I have had - for any lavender fans you know it's hard to do well and Sorella's is PERFECT. I also enjoy watching the merchandise and gifts change with the seasons/holidays...always unique and most not found elsewhere. Greeting card selection is top notch and appreciate seeing frequent new additions.
Always nice people. Coffee is tasty and fairly priced.
The food was delicious!!! Coffee was excellent
Our favorite place to go on Saturdays as mom and daughter! The place is beautiful, the people are so kind and the coffee is delicious.
Always great!
Cool spot
Great coffee shop in historic downtown Monroe. Lots of indoor and outdoor space for networking groups, work, schoolwork, or catching up with a friend. Check it out!
This place was amazing! The holiday feel was immaculate, the drinks were great!

Tucked away on a charming street, Sorella Coffee is a delightful gem that perfectly balances aesthetics, service and delicious drinks! You'll be greeted by a warm and inviting atmosphere adorned with soft pastel colors that encapsulate an urban rural look!
Clean, open, bright coffeeshop. Spacey enough that you don't clearly hear everyone else's conversation. Great coffee and friendly staff. My favorite coffee shop in the area!
Such a great atmosphere! Staff are always so nice. The drinks are great.
We preordered a large order of 17 different drinks. Sorella had all of the drinks made perfectly and labelled with everyone's names and drink details! Outstanding service, go here

I have really enjoyed the coffee and the great selections. My only critique would be to be a little quicker to welcome people into the shop and serve them with a smile. The few times I've been there that has not been the case. But I have been there early in the morning so I do want to say sometimes people are just tired and take a little bit longer to wake up. But overall, it's a lovely place.
This place is the Charm of Monroe that keeps my Wife and I wanting more. If you spend an afternoon or evening in Downtown Monroe you must stop in and enjoy a speciality coffee with your loved one!
Amazing place!
Lovely atmosphere and delicious coffee
Great atmosphere!! Friendly! Wonderful coffee!
I happened to stumble upon this adorable coffee shop and I'm so glad I did! The atmosphere is so cute and peaceful and my s'mores latte was so delicious!

I tried this place for the first time about 2 weeks ago. I had a regular coffee and my husband had some coffee with cream and caramel, we both ate some cake that had almonds on top and banana on bottom (I am not sure the name). It was the best I have ever tried here in NC. The reason why I am writing this review just now is because I was looking on Google what time it will be open tomorrow, since We went there We've been dreaming about coming back. It's so affordable coffee place that We could come every week, unfortunately We just don't have time every week. I highly recommend!!! God Bless the ladies behind the scenes to never give up, because everyone needs to know this place! In my opinion it's better and cheaper than Starbucks (which I also love, but not like Sorella).
Incredible atmosphere and vibe. The interior is immaculate. Creative beverages.
Cute place for coffee. Limited food/pastry options but quick sweet bites.  Several places to sit inside, inside upstairs, outside courtyard and street/sidewalk seating.
Such a cute place! Great environment. Felt safe, welcomed, and my chai latte was delicious! They have a great vibe going on here and I will be returning ASAP!
Super cute coffee shop with tasty coffee. So glad I stumbled upon this place on my walk downtown!
Visited first time and really Liked and enjoyed )))

Bright environment. Refreshing feel. The coffee is phenomenal! The house made syrups are delicious, the drinks are flawless, the menu items are well thought out, and operations were efficient. I'm already looking forward to going back!
Very awesome experience.  The space was beautiful, the employees were friendly and the coffee was delicious!

WHEN I TELL YOU THIS IS THE CUTEST COFFEE SHOP IVE EVER VISITED I AM NOT LYING! Everything about this place is adorable! The sweetest lady, Madeline took my order and made my coffee delicious! There is so much seating for studying, a cute corner with merch, and places for kids to play! The coffee and pastries were also an amazing quality and price! 10/10 recommend!
their seasonal blueberry cobbler coffee is the best thing i've ever had, i'm there way too often. ive never liked coffee before sorella!
Nice cozy atmosphere that is very Laid-back vibe
Great spot in town, friendly staff, excellent coffee, and tasty chocolate croissant

This was my first time coming here. I ordered the coconut creme iced coffee and it was so good! The atmosphere is clean and inviting. The baristas Turner and Katie were nice and personable. 10/10 recommend and would come again.
The best coffee I've ever had!

The best thing that's happened to Monroe in a long long time. I will go out of my way just to go into downtown Monroe to get coffee here cause it's so yummy. And it's a gorgeous space. 100% recommend.

Espresso is dialed in everyday to perfection, matcha is grade A, and community that is built around this business is second to none! Perfect place to visit as a family, to study, of just to treat yourself! My go to drink currently is the matcha latte with their homemade vanilla syrup!

One of the most lovely coffee shops I've ever had the pleasure of visiting! Every detail of Sorella - from its thoughtfully themed menu down to its handmade latte mugs - reflects a great level of care, respect, and passion for not only coffee, but the city of Monroe itself. It's wonderful to see an area I've grown up with gain new life in its downtown and I'm grateful to Sorella for propelling this advancement. It's high-quality coffee founded and managed by an owner that genuinely cares about bringing the best to Monroe. Come grab a cup and support a delicious small business!
Sorella coffee is the dreamiest coffee experience. They serve incredible coffee, have a beautiful location, and the staff is so friendly!

There aren't enough words to express how much I love this beautiful place! It's truly the most stunning coffee shop around! The coffee is absolutely to die for, the atmosphere is soft & the owner herself is such a beautiful soul! 10/10 recommend!

I could speak on how very beautiful this place is and how much thought is put into everything they serve, I could talk about the amazing atmosphere and the fresh new vibe it brings to downtown Monroe, or even the staff being so very friendly. BUT I really want to give credit to the amazing coffee! They are consistent! From coffees to matchas, even their seasonal menu. You can tell everything is well thought out, purposeful, and consistently perfect!!! I will drive 25 minutes just to get a cup of coffee because they are worth it! European cappuccinos in small town USA
Love going to Sorellas - they make a great latte and it's one of the few places in Monroe that's actually breaking the mold compared to other local businesses.
So lovely! We had my baby shower there. Everything was perfect! Drinks, service and food were great!
Great people. Great coffee. Top notch operations.

The best coffee and atmosphere for working from home! Plus, they have phenomenal decaf options including iced-decaf which is so rare to find and SO appreciated for those whole love coffee but can't do the caffeine. Worth every dollar and more!
Sorella is adorable, clean and has the best coffee. So glad they are close to home, it's delish everytime!

Sorella is a beautiful coffee shop with delicious coffee! The staff is so kind and works so hard to serve you the best coffee you can imagine. They're also always dreaming up new seasonal drinks that you'll love!

So glad I discovered this little gem!! Incredible atmosphere, beautiful shop, unbelievably wonderful coffee!!  The staff is friendly, personable and patient with indecisive customers like me... their  cappuccino is totally the best I've ever had not to mention how wonderful the other drinks I have tried are too. Just give it a try ... you will not be disappointed!! Exactly what downtown Monroe needed!!!

The absolute BEST coffee spot! Staff is wonderful and the coffee is amazing. This place is just what downtown Monroe needed. I grew up in Monroe, and it's wonderful to see the growth and quality of our small business thrive in the downtown area. Keep it up Sorella!

Always a joy to visit Sorella. If anyone says, "coffee" Sorella is always the go-to these days. So thankful for the love Savannah pours into coffee cups and for the details around every corner she thinks of.
A fantastic addition to downtown Monroe! They have great coffee and the owners and staff really truly care about their coffee and their business. Please go support them!

Hands down my favorite place in downtown Monroe! Will drive out of my way for this coffee. The atmosphere is beautiful but the drinks are next level. I'm always excited to see what special flavors they have come out with next!

This place truly cares about providing a place for the community and others to come together. Savannah, the owner has poured her heart into this place and it shows. I do not personally know her, but I've watched her journey on social media. Despite negative outside forces, she continues to shine. The coffee, the food, the atmosphere, and the heart of this place speaks volumes. Come give Sorella a try and support a Mom's small business. Don't let anyone else steer you wrong. There is a place for everyone to succeed!

This coffee shop has breathed life back to downtown monroe. The coffee, the barristas, the owner, and the cozy atmosphere makes this one of, if not THE best spot in Monroe. Period. Thanks for bringing such great vibes and coffee to my hometown.

Absolutely the best coffee! The owner is very friendly and has the best atmosphere. Sorella's  is why I have been coming back to downtown Monroe. We have been eating dinner at a few of the restaurants and enjoying coffee at Sorella's afterwards.
All around 10/10. My favorite coffee shop!
Awesome staff, Amazing coffee really shows how Monroe can adjust to the increasing demand for new spots that are changing with the world around it. Truly the best!
Our favorite coffee spot! Great drinks and vibes!
BEST coffee shop in Union county!!! Incredible staff, great coffee, and such a beautiful space!!!
They have excellent employees & the coffee is AMAZING!!!!!  Everyone needs to try Sorella!!!!
Amazing coffee and the friendliest baristas! Highly recommend that you stop by if you are local or traveling!!

Amazing coffee, beautiful place, and the sweetest staff. Our go to spot for coffee- and recently even threw a bridal shower here. The owner and team were so helpful every step of the way. I highly recommend them for events, quick meet ups with friends, a quiet place to study or work, and of course (hands down) the best coffee in Union County!
Love this space Savannah has created & the coffee and matcha drinks are so good!

My favorite coffee shop!!! Not only is this place beautiful but they have the best lattes! I don't think I've found a place that has beat their iced caramel latte, it's a 10/10! I love that they strive to support local businesses with their many pop up events as well as the ceramics they use and the bakery items they serve. Will continue to support Sorella and the awesome people that run it!
Easily the best coffee shop in the area. I love coffee and have tried many many coffee shops in the greater Charlotte area and none compare to Sorella!

Sorella has brought so much goodness to downtown Monroe. It is beautiful, has delicious coffee, and a peaceful atmosphere. Sorella brings people together and has become one of my favorite spots in town.

Best lattes in the greater area, friendly service, and community-based and beautiful atmosphere. I love their rotating seasonal menus and weekend events that promote small businesses. A coffee shop is only as good as their coffee, and they deliver! Every single regular or specialty drink I have tried has been absolutely delicious. A lovely addition to downtown!
U pay for aesthetic. Not quality.
Yummy coffee with some interesting cereal toppings. Cool atmosphere with seating in the loft.
Great coffee. Friendly employees. Cute and cozy atmosphere

Great first time here. The entire store smells amazing when you walk in. I like the minimalistic space and the decor. They have a really cute gift section (some locally made stuff) and a great menu.
I ordered a matcha latte and it was really good.
I love this nice edition to downtown Monroe.
I really liked this coffee
Loved sitting upstairs and enjoying my coffee and treat.   Atmosphere is just a little to sterile, austere for my taste.

P R E C I O U S!

What a gem!

Everyone was so kind and down to earth!

Can't wait to come back!

I'll be telling all my family and friends about this amazing little coffee shop!
Stopped by on our way from Pineville back towards Pageland, SC. On Main Str (right off Franklin Str). Had very nice atmosphere, very friendly people and great coffee. Would highly recommend.

I've been here a couple of times and I love it, I do wish there were  menus on the wall that you can read while waiting in line (they do have smaller ones for food and seasonal items) Other than that I love coming here!! The coffee is amazing!
Perfect coffee and danish!

This coffee shop was the missing piece for downtown Monroe. This place is such a beautifully executed vision with so many little details throughout the store. I highly recommend stopping by and grabbing a latte if you're in the area!
First time coming to this place and honestly recommend coming in to try the coffee. Bought my wife a special valentine flowers they had with a coffee and she love it would come again soon!
Hands down the best coffee shop in the area!
Great place to grab a coffee.
Love love love this place!! They're still growing so not a huge menu yet but their options are super yummy. The decor is clean and very bright. A must try in downtown Monroe!
Best Latte EVER!!

Love this little coffee shop! I'm personally not a coffee drinker so I can't comment on that but I did enjoy the matcha here! One of my friends had a latte and she enjoyed it but another friend had a cappuccino and said it's not good so do what you will with that information. The customer service was great and they were really caring when I asked if they could make an unusual drink. As well, the aesthetic and decor of the coffee shop is cute and very pleasing to the eye!
sorella is the best new coffee shop in monroe!! they are always so friendly and helpful with orders!! everything I've gotten has tasted amazing, and been so well made :) excited to see them grow!!
Sorella is amazing. We didn't expect them to be open on New Year's Day but they were and Lauren and Maddy were serving us! Thank you so much ladies! So anyways, come to Sorella! It's beautiful.
Awesome place and sweetest owner!! Wonderful coffee here Definitely returning!!

My first time coming I heard the coffee is good and I love supporting small and local  businesses. The girl that was at the cashier was very nice and welcoming recommending me one of their holiday drinks which was a creme brulee  it was hot and tasty. I also got a peppermint muffin which was very sweet which I like would definitely come again!

Been living here for 4 years now and this amazing place has by far the most superior coffee in the community and most likely in all of union county. We have tried so many establishments in our time here and always find ourselves coming back to Sorellas. You will never be disappointed when visiting Sorellas. The seasonal menus have been innovative plus the amazing cozy vibe and aesthetic adds to its charm. Support this growing business asap! Thank me later!

Wonderful bright and inviting place for good beverages and some peaceful relaxation or a chance to catch up on work. Comfy place to sit and watch Main Street go by with a great cup of your favorite coffee!

The inside is so cozy and great vibes! I only knock off points for the actual coffee.  I got the seasonal gingerbread snap latte, and I won't even lie it tasted like pure milk & foam.  I'm a huge coffee girl, and I gotta say I was disappointed by the drink, but the place and women who work there are lovely!
What an amazing quaint little place.
I like this coffee shop a lot I will be back.
Coffee Shop is really cute, Employees are super nice, but the coffee is okay. Got a hot caramel latte that wasn't hot at all. Will try again though.
Such a cute place! Definitely a hidden gem in monroe, coffee was great, it was so cute inside and workers were super sweet!

Workers are super kind. Location is super cute. Beverages are low par. We did go twice to try to give it a chance - but in their lattes, there is barely half an espresso shot (I watched them make it) and my drinks both times tasted like pure milk. Same for the matcha - so little of the actual matcha, the flavor was pure milk.

Super cute, hope the place finds its feet, but if you're looking for a true coffee or espresso flavor in your drinks - they don't quite have it here unfortunately.
Tasty pimemto scone. Delicious coffee. Warm and inviting atmosphere. Friendly helpful staff. Convenient location.

I went here today and got the "Sookie" latte and an everything bagel pastry and it was fabulous. The people that work there are very nice and helpful. This is a great place for college students to study, very peaceful atmosphere.

THE place to get coffee, in my humble opinion. Of all the coffee places that have popped up I was still missing that element I craved. Homemade syrups (or at least anything but Torani), character, something I could relate to, a cozy feeling. I wanted a coffee shop I would've opened. SORELLA IS IT PEOPLES. I'm so happy it's here (and less than 10 minutes from my house) and 100% worth the hype. Its fall menu is fantastic, but even the regular menu is streamlined and delicious. The pastries are fun and yummy (savory scones and danishes? I mean come on we love that). Super excited to have this addition and would 10/10 recommend!
Not only are the drinks good but also pretty. We love these Blank ceramic mugs! They are our favorite thoughtful detail about this place!
Love the chill hop playlist

Im obsessed with their homemade
caramel. I've been getting their iced caramel lattes and I'm hooked !
Total gilmore girl vibes. Great craft coffee and perfect aesthetics. Nailed it.
The best coffee shop in the CLT area! Staff is friendly and knows their coffee! My new weekly spot!

I've been to Sorella multiple times now. Each time has been such a great experience. The atmosphere is beautiful and calm. All of the employees are so nice. But the coffee.....amazing! Some of the best coffee I've had! It is so smooth and just delicious!

I went here this morning. The place is beautiful and the atmosphere was wonderful. Whomever designed this place has to watch Sweet Magnolia cause I felt like I was in that cute little town. I wanted to grab my laptop and sit there all day!! Next time, can I just take the decor with me to my office where I'm currently sitting to work? Thanks! Now to what everyone wants to know about...the Coffee. It was AMAZING! I got an Iced Carmel Latte with Oat milk and I may or may have not left with an oatmeal cookie at 7:30AM. It was yummy  First of all the Carmel is homemade and I know homemade when I taste it! Starbucks could neverrrrrrrr! Kudos to the owners! Very well thought out and done. Congratulations and thank you for the Coffee... and cookie at 7:30AM

What a great addition to Monroe! Friendly staff, great coffees (and chocolate milk for my littles), crisp and cozy atmosphere.  Way to freshen up Monroe even more!  I'm not one to like DD or starbs, so this is refreshing to have a local option!

Such a great addition to downtown Monroe. I wasn't sure what to get so I asked the nice lady at the counter to pick something for me. She picked one of their new fall flavors and it was delicious. I didn't have to wait very long for my drink. Everyone working was very nice. It's a sweet atmosphere and I'll definitely be back.
So grateful to have this lovely place in Monroe! Such a beautiful space with the best lattes...my car just keeps taking me there ;)

I couldn't have loved my visit more at Sorella. My mom had a pumpkin spice coffee, I had a golden turmeric both were perfect
We shared a peanut butter cookie and a coffee cake, and wanted to take more home Such a beautiful shop inside and out. Savannah is the sweetest most caring owner This will become a regular stop for us

I've visited Sorella twice now and only have good things to say! The coffee is delicious, the staff is friendly, and the atmosphere is cute and inviting. So far I've tried my coffee staple, an iced caramel latte, and an iced Sookie's oatmeal cookie (on the fall menu)-- both were PERFECT! The pumpkin bread and coffee cake were also delicious. You can really tell how much thought the owner has put into every detail. I am so excited to have such an awesome new spot in Monroe and can't wait for my next visit.

I tried Sorella today for the first time and I can't wait to go back. I had a vanilla latte and I was genuinely sad when it was gone because it was so good! The staff was super friendly and the atmosphere was amazing. I'm so excited this coffee shop is open!!! You can tell they put their hearts into their business!

I've been to Sorella almost everyday since it's opened and it's been wonderful every single time!! I've switched my order up here and there and it's always been consistent! All the staff is super friendly and the atmosphere is amazing! So glad our little downtown Monroe has such a cute spot!

Really enjoyed my first experience here. Ordered an iced vanilla latte with an extra shot of espresso and it was amazing. The staff was friendly and the space was clean.

They also had some good looking pastries which I plan on trying at my next visit.
Love the vibes, the coffee is amazing (I got a caramel latte) and the people are sweet.

I ordered a 16 oz hot Americano. It was watered down. It tasted like there was one shot of espresso in my Americano. For an Americano specifically that size there should be at least 3 shots of espresso.
So grateful to have this GEM in Monroe! The most aesthetically pleasing environment with the best espresso... can't wait to be back!

I love this place & will definitely be back! They are very friendly & the coffee is awesome. The atmosphere is super cute and comfy! You can tell the owners put a lot of time & thought into this place.
Excellently pulled, quality espresso. Glad to see a new coffee shop that values the basics!
